name: Misrepresentation or false statement in receipts and reports
text: [§187A-12.4  Misrepresentation or false statement in receipts and reports.]  Any person who knowingly misrepresents any material fact or makes a false statement in any document required by subtitle 5 of title 12, or any rule adopted thereunder, shall be guilty of a petty misdemeanor and punished as provided by law. [L 1999, c 195, §1]
